content: dd s crochet crochet cinnamoroll materials - size e 3 5mm crochet hook - worsted yarn i use simply soft white/blue/pink - polyester fiber filling - tapestry needle & marker - optional use felt for eyes or just embroidery with yarn terms magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch fo = fasten_off/finish chain = chain st = stitch blo = back loop only flo = front loop only decrease = decrease / make 1 single_crochet over next two stitches increase = increase / make 2 single_crochet on the same stitch f/o = finish off leave a long string for sewing parts note each round is continues round do not slip-stitch approx 3 ¼ tall unless indicated number indicates total stitch pattern head ears x 2 using white color yarn use white color yarn r1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet 6 r1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet 6 r2 repeat *increase* 6 times 12 r2 repeat *increase* 6 times 12 r3 repeat *1sc 1inc* 6 times 18 r3 repeat *1sc 1inc* 6 times 18 r4 repeat *2sc 1inc* 6 times 24 r4~r6 make 1sc for each stitch around 18 r5 repeat *3sc 1inc* 6 times 30 r7 repeat *7sc 1dec* 2 times 16 r5 repeat *4sc 1inc* 6 times 36 r8 make 1sc for each stitch around 16 r6 repeat *5sc 1inc* 6 times 42 r9 repeat *6sc 1dec* 2 times 14 r7~r12 make 1sc for each stitch 42 r10 make 1sc for each stitch around 14 r13 repeat *19sc 1dec* 2 times 40 r11 repeat *5sc 1dec* 2 times 12 r14 repeat *3sc 1dec* 8 times 32 r12 make 1sc for each stitch around 12 r15 repeat *2sc 1dec* 8 times 24 r13 make 5sc 1dec 6sc 11 begin stuff with fiber filling r14 make 1sc for each stitch around 11 r16 repeat *1sc 1dec* 8 times 16 f/o r15 make 9sc 1dec 10 r16 make 1sc for each stitch around 10 body r17 only make 5sc for half round and f/o use white color yarn stuff both ears r1 magic_ring of 8 single_crochet 8 r2 increase in every stitch 16 hands x 2 r3 repeat *1sc 1inc* 8 times 24 use white color yarn r4~r6 make 1sc for each stitch 24 r1 magic_ring of 5 single_crochet 5 r7 repeat *4sc 1dec* 4 times 20 r2 make 2sc 1inc 2sc 6 r8 make 1sc for each stitch 20 r3 make 1sc for each stitch 6 f/o r9 repeat *3sc 1dec* 4 times 16 f/o and stuff @copyright | all right reserved | dd s crochet by denise kao | http //ddscrochet pixnet net/blog dd s crochet crochet cinnamoroll tail feet x 2 use white color yarn using white color yarn r1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet 6 r1 magic_ring of 8 single_crochet 8 r2 repeat *1sc 1inc* 3 times 9 r2 make 1sc for each stitch around 8 r3~r4 make 1sc for each stitch 9 r3 make 2sc 2dec 2sc 6 f/o r5 make 7sc 1dec 8 stuff lightly r6~r7
